The reason for this classification is that the 'snapshot_links_per_second' configuration directly affects the rate at which snapshots are taken in the system, which can have a significant impact on system performance. The code context shows that this configuration is used to create a RateLimiter, which indicates that it is involved in controlling the rate of a certain operation.
